ca.eandb.jmist.framework.geometry

Class InsideOutGeometry

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.eandb.jmist.framework.scene.SceneElementDecorator
      • ca.eandb.jmist.framework.geometry.InsideOutGeometry
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Bounded3, SceneElement, VisibilityFunction3, Serializable

    public final class InsideOutGeometry
extends SceneElementDecorator
    A SceneElement decorator that flips another SceneElement inside out.
    Author:
    Brad Kimmel
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • generateImportanceSampledSurfacePoint

        public double generateImportanceSampledSurfacePoint(int index,
                                                    SurfacePoint x,
                                                    ShadingContext context,
                                                    double ru,
                                                    double rv,
                                                    double rj)
        Description copied from interface: SceneElement
        Generates a SurfacePoint randomly that is uniformly distributed over the surface of the specified primitive (optional operation).
        Specified by:
        generateImportanceSampledSurfacePoint in interface SceneElement
        Overrides:
        generateImportanceSampledSurfacePoint in class SceneElementDecorator
        Parameters:
        index - The index of the primitive from which to generate the random point.
        x - The SurfacePoint to be illuminated, that should influence the sampling distribution.
        context - The ShadingContext to receive the generated surface point.
        ru - The first random variable (must be in [0, 1]).
        rv - The second random variable (must be in [0, 1]).
        rj - The third random variable (must be in [0, 1]).
        Returns:
        The weight for the randomly generated SurfacePoint.
